item.description:
Single Mingle at the Sheraton Commander in Harvard Square Cambridge
And don't fret about the parking - we have negotiated $5 Valet Parking !!!

Singles Dance with DJ, Prizes, food, martinis, wine & optional ice breaking activities.

Cocktails from 7:00-8:30 …. Dancing 830-Close
Optional Speed Dating from 730-830. First come first served
Other Ice breakers for non-speed daters

Dancing with America's Best DJ ...Tommy Sheehan !!

$15 door charge

Please Dress to Impress - No Jeans, T-shirts or Sneakers Please.
This is a classy joint - let's rise to the occasion and look good.

Rooms - $129 - discounted for us - it's almost half price. When you're making the reservation just tell them you're with the Singles Event.

Please Tell others who you are chatting with here. These events are a great way for us to meet a bunch of other singles and get that first meeting out of the way in a low pressure atmosphere !!

See you all there –

Sheraton Commander 16 Garden Street Cambridge, MA 02138 ~ (617) 547-4800
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Single Mingle Signs
item.name: Single Mingle at the Sheraton Commander in Cambridge
